name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With an orange box body, classic retro console buttons, and classic arms and legs, Pixel stands out with its unique style. Its screen displays vibrant and detailed visuals, reminiscent of old-school oscilloscope displays. To add an extra touch of coolness, Pixel wears a pair of stylish shades. With its distinct appearance and love for all things electronic, Pixel is a beloved member of the WebtrES club.
